songs.title: Aja Ni Aja
songs.lyrics:
Yo
Blackberries on the silence
We are in the VIP now
Look at these bottles... Let's go

Bohemia back
She flies we party
So sexy in sarree
My party new for..
Lovin' the Mumbai night
Lovin' the Delhi night
...

[Bohemia]
Sun tere picche lage saare log
Juhu beech ton leke Chandani Chowk ton leke Hyderabad
Patiyala pag ne chura li raat...
Tenu kuj ni yaad

Hunn nachna main saari raat tere naal
Nachaana tenu saari raat
Aja aaja ni soni, we wanna rock n roll
Aaja ni aaja ni bimbo..

Sunn tere picche lage saare log
Security vi mainnu paaye na rok
Mera galiyan vich naam
Jo to mangti vo bol
Atthe di ladkiya sohniya
Kisse to vi pucch le naam
...

They call me baby bash
Because my party's bash
I smoke with naughty ass
Now i can think shake that ass

Shake.. shake that ass (repeats)

Aja ni aaja soni, Aja ni aaja soni
Aaja ni aaja ni bimbo
